relations.subject: Microbial
relations.evidence: Microbial applications can be beneficial in bioregenerative life support systems, their applicability to biological in situ resource utilization (bISRU), and their capability to be genetically engineered for biotechnological space applications.

relations.subject: bioregenerative life support systems
relations.evidence: Research on bioregenerative life support systems (BLSS) has shown that microbes play a vital role in generating essential resources for human survival through biological processes.

relations.subject: research
